summary.p: The messenger can take something with him if necessary; greetings to Pellikan. Requests to take care of the payment and delivery of a comb. [Hans] Kotter will be treated more generously as soon as he comes to Konstanz.

div.p: I have nothing to write, just letting you know that the messenger is available if you have anything for me. Greet Pellikan for me.

Dear, do me a service propter sotios (for the sake of companions) and send your boy to the comb maker (Kammacher), who is making me a comb with an ivory handle, and pay him the maker's fee, since I have given him the ivory, and send it to me by courier. However, let me know what you owe him. Or I will send you 3 batzen (a type of coin) here; pay him from that. I do not believe it will be more. Kotter should have been treated more generously; but later, when he comes to us, we will take care of it.
To Lord Heinrich Bullinger, my dearest brother in the Lord.
